items.title: Awesome Qr Code
items.content_text:
### Libraries / Ruby

*   [rqrcode `W` (‚≠ê1.9k)](https://github.com/whomwah/rqrcode) - A neat Ruby QR code generator exporting to `svg`, `png` and `ansi` with configurable size, color and other attributes.
items.content_html:
Libraries / Ruby

  • rqrcode W (‚≠ê1.9k) - A neat Ruby QR code generator exporting to svg, png and ansi with configurable size, color and other attributes.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [lsd (tankeryang) (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/tankeryang/zsh-lsd) - Replaces `ls` and `tree` commands with [lsd (‚≠ê15k)](https://github.com/Peltoche/lsd).
*   [nvm-auto-use (jrr997) (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/jrr997/zsh-nvm-auto-use) - Automatically manages your Node.js versions with [nvm (‚≠ê86k)](https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm) based on your current directory.
*   [nvm-auto-use (tomsquest) (‚≠ê18)](https://github.com/tomsquest/nvm-auto-use.zsh) - Calls `nvm use` automatically whenever you enter a directory that contains an `.nvmrc` file with a string telling `nvm` which node to use.

### Completions / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [jenv (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/cmuench/zsh-jenv) - Tab completions for [jEnv (‚≠ê6.2k)](https://github.com/jenv/jenv).
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • lsd (tankeryang) (‚≠ê1) - Replaces ls and tree commands with lsd (‚≠ê15k).
  • nvm-auto-use (jrr997) (‚≠ê1) - Automatically manages your Node.js versions with nvm (‚≠ê86k) based on your current directory.
  • nvm-auto-use (tomsquest) (‚≠ê18) - Calls nvm use automatically whenever you enter a directory that contains an .nvmrc file with a string telling nvm which node to use.

Completions / superconsole - Windows-only

  • jenv (‚≠ê0) - Tab completions for jEnv (‚≠ê6.2k).

items.title: Awesome Network Analysis
items.content_text:
### Books / General Overviews

*   *[Social Networks. An Introduction](https://olizardo.github.io/networks-textbook/)*, by Omar Lizardo and Isaac Jilbert - free to read online (2023).

### Datasets / Topic-specific

*   [Stanford Large Network Dataset Collection](https://snap.stanford.edu/data/index.html).

### Professional Groups / Research Groups (USA)

*   [Stanford Network Analysis Project](https://snap.stanford.edu/), by [Jure Leskovec](https://cs.stanford.edu/~jure/).

### Software / Python

*   [RAPIDS cuGraph (‚≠ê2k)](https://github.com/rapidsai/cugraph) - Python packages and C/C++/CUDA libraries focused on GPU-accelerated graph analytics.
*   [Graphinate](https://erivlis.github.io/graphinate/) - Python package aimed at generating graphs from data sources, built on top of `networkx`.
*   [rustworkx (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/Qiskit/rustworkx) - A high performance Python graph library implemented in Rust.

### Software / Tutorials

*   [A tutorial for network centrality in R (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/schochastics/centrality) (2023).
*   [Tidy Network Analysis in R using the tidygraph package](https://mr.schochastics.net/material/tidynetAnaR/) (2022).
items.content_html:
Books / General Overviews

  • Social Networks. An Introduction, by Omar Lizardo and Isaac Jilbert - free to read online (2023).

Datasets / Topic-specific

  • Stanford Large Network Dataset Collection.

Professional Groups / Research Groups (USA)

  • Stanford Network Analysis Project, by Jure Leskovec.

Software / Python

  • RAPIDS cuGraph (‚≠ê2k) - Python packages and C/C++/CUDA libraries focused on GPU-accelerated graph analytics.
  • Graphinate - Python package aimed at generating graphs from data sources, built on top of networkx.
  • rustworkx (‚≠ê1.4k) - A high performance Python graph library implemented in Rust.

Software / Tutorials

  • A tutorial for network centrality in R (‚≠ê2) (2023).
  • Tidy Network Analysis in R using the tidygraph package (2022).

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### APIs, Data, and ML

*   [Insomnia](https://insomnia.rest) - Open-source API client for designing and testing APIs, it supports REST and GraphQL

### Feature Toggles Management Platforms

*   [Statsig](https://www.statsig.com) - A robust platform for feature management, A/B testing, analytics, and more. Its generous free plan offers unlimited seats, flags, experiments, and dynamic configurations, supporting up to 1 million events per month.

### IDE and Code Editing

*   [MarsCode](https://www.marscode.com/) - A free AI-powered cloud-based IDE.
items.content_html:
APIs, Data, and ML

  • Insomnia - Open-source API client for designing and testing APIs, it supports REST and GraphQL

Feature Toggles Management Platforms

  • Statsig - A robust platform for feature management, A/B testing, analytics, and more. Its generous free plan offers unlimited seats, flags, experiments, and dynamic configurations, supporting up to 1 million events per month.

IDE and Code Editing

  • MarsCode - A free AI-powered cloud-based IDE.

items.title: Awesome Osint
items.content_text:
### Social Media Tools / Instagram

*   [Toutatis (‚≠ê2.8k)](https://github.com/megadose/toutatis) - a tool that allows you to extract information from instagrams accounts such as s, phone numbers and more

### Vehicle / Automobile Research / GitHub

*   [FaxVIN](https://www.faxvin.com/) - Vehicle History Reports. A license plate lookup tool that returns info like VIN, make & model of vehicle, age, and numerous other details.
*   [EpicVIN](https://epicvin.com/) - Vehicle reports are compiled from various data sources, including historical accident records from state agencies and other entities like NMVTIS. License plate lookup that returns VIN and car millage.

### Image Search / GitHub

*   [Dupli Checker](https://www.duplichecker.com/reverse-image-search.php) - You can search for an image by uploading + with URL or typing the keyword or any word you want to explore related to images.
*   [Google Lens](https://lens.google.com/)
*   [Image Raider](https://www.imageraider.com) - is our reverse image search tool for completing individual searches. When you upload an image to this page, we'll scour the internet to find its source and all of the other pages where it has been posted.
*   [PimEyes](https://pimeyes.com) - an online face search engine that goes through the Internet to find pictures containing given faces.
*   [Pixsy](https://www.pixsy.com/) - Take back control of your images. See where & how your images are being used online!
*   [Search4faces](https://search4faces.com/) - a service for searching people on the Internet by photo.
items.content_html:
Social Media Tools / Instagram

  • Toutatis (‚≠ê2.8k) - a tool that allows you to extract information from instagrams accounts such as s, phone numbers and more

Vehicle / Automobile Research / GitHub

  • FaxVIN - Vehicle History Reports. A license plate lookup tool that returns info like VIN, make & model of vehicle, age, and numerous other details.
  • EpicVIN - Vehicle reports are compiled from various data sources, including historical accident records from state agencies and other entities like NMVTIS. License plate lookup that returns VIN and car millage.

Image Search / GitHub

  • Dupli Checker - You can search for an image by uploading + with URL or typing the keyword or any word you want to explore related to images.
  • Google Lens
  • Image Raider - is our reverse image search tool for completing individual searches. When you upload an image to this page, we'll scour the internet to find its source and all of the other pages where it has been posted.
  • PimEyes - an online face search engine that goes through the Internet to find pictures containing given faces.
  • Pixsy - Take back control of your images. See where & how your images are being used online!
  • Search4faces - a service for searching people on the Internet by photo.
